definition: to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)

sentences.english: Whitman was cleared of the conflict by the EPA inspector general.
sentences.chinese: 环境署监察长使惠特曼从以权谋私的指责中得以开脱。

sentences.english: I believe that he did not do it for personal gain.
sentences.chinese: 我相信他没有以权谋私。

sentences.english: Machiavellian and manipulative , the lords are often maligned.
sentences.chinese: 权谋与操控，阴影议员常常是恶毒的。

sentences.english: The third part discloses the hypocrisy of Machiavellian culture.
This forms the hypocrisy of Machiavellian culture.
sentences.chinese: 这就形成了权谋文化的虚伪性。

definition: art of politics/political tricks (often derog.)/power play/to play at politics/underhand trickery
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
military strategy/military tactics/originally refers to military classics Six Secret Teachings 六韜|六韬[Liu4 tao1] and Three Strategies 三略[San1 lu:e4]
lit. to devise battle plan in a tent (idiom)/fig. planning strategies
